title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: When a working set is removed, the changes take effect immediately without any confirmation.
OB: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view is filtered accordingly.
EB: After removing the working set, the package view should no longer be filtered and should display all packages and files.
SR:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it. Verify that the package view is filtered accordingly. 
2. Open the working set dialog again, create a second working set, and delete the first working set. 
3. Verify that the package view is no longer filtered and displays all packages and files.
